title: (x) Edguy logo - custom designed {Adriano S}
content:
![edguy](http://web.archive.org/web/20080924093500im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/28480.jpg)   
   
what is this font???

 [‹ (x) 1000 Articoli - (similar to) Bullet {Jack K.}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080924093500/http:/www.typophile.com/node/3572 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Duchy Originals - calligraphy {Mike Y} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080924093500/http:/www.typophile.com/node/3566 "Go to next forum topic")
author: fallen_angel

comments.content: It isn't a font, it's custom lettering.

Definitely. It would be an incredible coincidence   
that the shapes of those characters would fit into   
each other so perfectly.
